name: Kianate: Mine World
description:
Kianate: Mine World - Closed Pre-Alpha

HOME - YOUTUBE - DISCORD - DEVLOGS

Join our discord to play. - Kianate: Mine World is a game about dodging mines. Just dodge the mines.

There may be a few anomolies; Storms, enemies.

You can upgrade your ship, weapons, shields, and abilities

You can also mine, once you unlock it.

You can trade, buy, and craft.

Not all features mentioned are currently added. Early access code: 4365jk-vc8sds-ANDKF

https://discord.gg/arfTA8R - Join our discord

THIS GAME IS IN PRE-ALPHA. NOT ALL FEATURES MENTIONED ARE CURRENTLY ADDED. WE MAKE NO PROMISE ABOUT THE FULL COMPLETION OF THIS GAME. 

IT WILL MOST LIKELY RELEASE EARLY ACCESS IN EARLY 2021

Basic Roadmap
